sentences.en: a company whose reputation was spotless until this scandal broke
sentences.cn: 该丑闻传出之前名誉毫无瑕疵的一家公司

sentences.en: A spotless stove told us that his mother is a diligent housekeeper.
sentences.cn: 炉子清洁无瑕就表明他母亲是个勤劳的主妇.

sentences.en: Dartie, who had travelled to Newmarket the night before, arrayed himself in spotless checks.
sentences.cn: 达尔弟头一天夜里就赶到纽马开, 穿了一身整洁的格子呢衣服.

sentences.en: Each morning cleaners make sure everything is spotless.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨，清洁工们会把一切都打扫得干干净净。

sentences.en: Even in the most spotless homes, carpets need regular cleaning to keep them looking good.
sentences.cn: 即便是在最干净的房子里，地毯也需要定期清洁以保持美观。

sentences.en: He must keep his honor spotless.
sentences.cn: 他必须把他的荣誉保持得白璧无瑕.

sentences.en: He threw his cigarette carefully onto the middle of the General's spotless floor.
sentences.cn: 他特意又把香烟丢在将军那一尘不染的木板地正中.

sentences.en: I determined that my dinner should be as spotless as the snow.
sentences.cn: 我决定,我做的饮食必须洁白无疵,象雪一样.

sentences.en: Liberty is not a crowned goddess , beautiful, in spotless garments, victorious, supreme.
sentences.cn: 自由可不是什么头戴冠冕的美丽的女神, 穿着洁白无瑕的衣裳, 象征着胜利, 至高无上.

sentences.en: Mr Sympson proved to be a man of spotless respectability.
sentences.cn: 辛普森先生原来就是一位无懈可击的体面人物.

sentences.en: Remember that Jesus is returning for a Holy and Spotless Bride.
sentences.cn: 记住耶稣再来是要迎接圣洁无污点的新娘.

sentences.en: She wore a spotless white apron.
sentences.cn: 她围着一条洁白的围裙.

sentences.en: The kitchen is spotless and the floors are gleaming white.
sentences.cn: 厨房一尘不染,地板白的发亮.

sentences.en: Yet he is always represented clean , combed , and sleek , in spotless raiment, erect.
sentences.cn: 可是他总是被描写成发肤整洁,衣履无尘, 悠然挺立.

words.tran_cn: 无可挑剔的；无瑕疵的；纯洁的

trans.tran_cn: 极其清洁的，一尘不染的，（人）无瑕疵的，纯洁的
trans.tran_en: if someone has a spotless  reputation  or record, people know or think they have never done anything bad
